clause_001: All claims must be submitted within 30 days.
clause_002: Coverage includes fire, theft, and accidental damage.
clause_003: Exclusions apply to natural disasters and war-related damages.
clause_004: Medical claims must be filed within 15 days of the incident.
clause_005: All policyholders must notify the insurer of any changes in coverage requirements.
clause_006: Claims related to fraud or misrepresentation are not covered.
